hero.desc: ArkWork connects energy professionals with opportunities across oil & gas, LNG, utilities, and emerging energy technologies. Browse jobs, get industry insights, and discover companies—all in one place.

explore.title: Explore Without Signing In
explore.desc: Browse jobs, discover companies, and stay updated with industry news. Sign in only when you're ready to apply.

jobs.title: Browse Jobs
jobs.desc: Search thousands of sector opportunities with advanced filters.

companies.title: Discover Companies
companies.desc: Explore energy companies and learn about their culture and opportunities.

news.title: Industry News
news.desc: Stay updated with the latest energy sector news and tender opportunities.

features.title: Everything You Need for Energy Careers
features.desc: From job search to industry insights, ArkWork gives you complete tools to grow in the energy sector.

1.title: Smart Job Search
1.desc: Find energy jobs with AI matching and advanced filters.

2.title: Company Profiles
2.desc: Explore companies and learn about their culture & opportunities.

3.desc: Get matched to roles based on your skills and experience.

4.title: Industry News
4.desc: Follow the latest energy news and tenders.

5.title: Professional Network
5.desc: Connect with energy professionals and leaders.

6.title: Energy Focus
6.desc: Deep coverage of oil & gas, LNG, and utilities.

final.title: Ready to Energize Your Career?
final.desc: Join thousands who trust ArkWork for jobs, insights, and community.
final.note: No credit card required • Sign up takes less than 1 minute

footer.description: Build your career in the energy sector: jobs, tenders, and insights for oil & gas, LNG, and utilities professionals.
footer.madeFor: Made for the energy & oil & gas community.

about.title: About
about.intro: ArkWork is an innovative platform that connects job opportunities, tenders, and industry news with professionals and businesses across the energy sector.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: To become the leading bridge between talented professionals, companies, and business opportunities—creating a collaborative ecosystem that drives economic growth and innovation.

points.1: Provide easy access to the latest job openings and tenders.
points.2: Help companies find the right talents efficiently.
points.3: Deliver reliable and relevant industry news.
points.4: Foster collaboration between industry players and professionals.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.desc: We uphold honesty and transparency in all aspects of our work.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: We continuously adapt and create creative solutions for market needs.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.desc: We believe in the power of synergy between individuals and organizations.

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: We are committed to delivering the best services to our users.

closing.title: Join ArkWork Today
closing.desc: Whether you are a professional seeking new opportunities or a company looking to hire top talent, ArkWork is the right place to start.
